scripts.build: npm run test && node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js --out-dir lib ./src && cp package.json ./lib
scripts.build:raw: rm -rf ./lib; cp -a ./src ./lib && node lib/index.js && cp package.json ./lib
scripts.build:clean: npm run distclean; npm run build
scripts.build:pub: npm run build && npm run pub
scripts.build:patch:pub: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run pub
scripts.build:minor:pub: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run pub
scripts.build:major:pub: npm run build && npm version major && npm run pub
